author: slava77
body:
- map update:
    - add pp_on_AA workflow 158.0
    - add 2018B data
    - add MTD phase-2 workflows (D24)
- a few new plots
    - h over em for photons
    - validity flag for hcal (h over em) variables in electrons and photons
    - monitoring of pixel tracks in HI workflows
    - new names of MTD rechits (mtdRecHits instead of ftlRecHits)
    - a plot of muon pt in log10
title: updated for reco comparisons (outputs in validateJR)
